alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 11:21PM AKST until November 09 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range, Dalton Highway Summits, White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River and Central Interior. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Areas of blowing and drifting snow expected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
